name: Zoology Quiz - name the animal
description: Are you well schooled in the animal kingdom?  Can you recognize a Holly Blue (Celastrina argiolus) from a picture? Try it out with the Zoology Quiz!  Browse through an amazing catalog of dinosaurs, mammals, reptiles, amphibians, birds, insects, spiders, fishes and crabs. Mark your favorites in the slide show. Use the filter symbol within the titelbar to filter animals either by favorites or by similar ones. Searching for a specific animal is also possible.   Choose the correct animal name out of four choices. Hints will give you an textual abstract for the animal. Use 50:50 to reduce from four to two choices or take a joker to skip a question.  Learn more about the searched animal in Wikipedia.  At the end of your knowledge question and answer session you will be evaluated.  Select playmode, number of questions or credits in preferences menu. There you can also set a filter on a certain animal class. Activate the expert mode if you want to get really challenging questions.   A fast internet connection is required so that the pictures can be streamed smoothly onto your device. You can decrease data traffic by deactivating high image resolution in the settings menu.  About permissions :  - INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE : used for getting data from wikipedia  There is also a premium version available.  The Biology Quiz  - includes the animal kingdom - includes plant kingdom (Plants Quiz) and fungus - contains more than 10000 species    Please use the feedback option within the settings in case you have some question, problem or suggestion on Zoology Quiz. We are happy to hear from you.  What are you waiting for. Improve your knowledge with Zoology Quiz. RARU Software German Engineering
